Package ghost

Class Ghosts

java.lang.Object
ghost.Ghosts
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ambusher, Chaser, Ignorant, Whim
public abstract class Ghosts
extends java.lang.Object
this class is the abstract class of all of the ghost, need to implement findTarget()

    • Ghosts

      public Ghosts​(App windowsFrame, int origX, int origY, long speed)
      Parameters:
      windowsFrame - Current window of the game
      origX - the starting position of the ghost

      speed - the speed of the ghost

    • accessible

      public boolean accessible​(int direction)
      test if the next step is wall or not
      Parameters:
      direction - direction of the next pixel
      Returns:
      if it is true it means the next pixel is not a wall

    • countingDistance

      public double countingDistance​(Message nextPosition, Message targetPosition)
      counting the distance between next position and ghost
      Parameters:

      targetPosition - the position of the target
      Returns:

      public int judgement​(Message targetPosition)
      judge which way is the closest way to the target
      Parameters:
      targetPosition - position of the target
      Returns:
      next direction ghost should go to

    • intersection

      public boolean intersection()
      Returns:
      if it is true it mean ghost encounter a intersection

    • turnBack

      public void turnBack()
      turn backward

    • run

      public Message run​(int mode, Message playerPosition)
      if it is a intersection, make a choose and decide the next direction if it isn't an intersection and current direction is movable, keep going else it turn back
      Parameters:
      mode - current mode
      playerPosition - position of the player
      Returns:
      the next position of the ghost

    • escape

      public Message escape​(int frame)
      decide the next direction randomly when encounter an intersection, using frame as seed of random number
      Parameters:
      frame - use to generate random number
      Returns:
      the next position

    • findTarget

      public abstract Message findTarget​(int mode, Message playerPosition)
      find the target according to the characteristic of the ghost
      Parameters:
      mode - current ghost mode
      playerPosition - position of the player
      Returns:
      position of the target
